attributes.action: ... abolish the House of Commons and revert to total rule by Monarchy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to ask that the House of Commons be abolished in its entirety and that the power of rule to returned solely to the Monarchy and the aristrocracy as it has been shown over the entire course of history that the common people are totally incapable of performing any sort of ruling role in any form whatsoever that benefits mankind or country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
